attributes.action: Let sock have a pirate hat icon on b3ta
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I donated to www.b3ta.com not just money but time and art, all I'm asking for is a fair icon, a pirate hat, or some sort of ninja thing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
